title: Let's Watch TV: Big Little Lies
description:
This week, Joe gets a dramatic dose of that crazy teacher life as he and Mama Fran watch the HBO series Big Little Lies, which documents the trials and tribulations of an affluent public school parents whose drama escalates to the point of murder!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
